SEARCH
模块 it.polimi.ingsw
程序包 it.polimi.ingsw.Networking

接口 Client

所有已知实现类:
RMIClient, SocketClient
public interface Client
The Client interface defines the contract for client-side communication with the server. Implementations of this interface will handle sending messages to the server.

  • 方法概要

    修饰符和类型
    方法
    说明
    void
    messageToServer(GenericClientMessage msg)
    Sends a message to the server.

  • 方法详细资料

    • messageToServer

      void messageToServer(GenericClientMessage msg) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to the server.
      参数:
      msg - the message to be sent to the server
      抛出:
      RemoteException - if there is a problem with the remote method invocation
